titleStmt.title: The Christian warfare being some serious, humble, and practical reflections on Psalm XV, wherein the princely prophet David's great and soul-ravishing question, divine answer and application, are considered / by J.L. ...
titleStmt.author: J. L.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by John Gain ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: copy at reel 2407:14b bound and filmed with the first [16] pages of "The Wars of David" (Wing L791A), and lacks preliminary leaf following title page.
Title card for item at reel 2407:14b erroneously lists work as "The laws of David".
Reproductions of originals in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library (reel 1703) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2407).
